    Amateur Radio Shops in Akihabara

    Passing through Tokyo this week and took the opportunity to visit a few amateur radio shops in Akihabara.

    First had an awesome Teppanyaki Lunch at the XEX An Restaurant, which is on the top floor of Daimaru Tokyo, directly connected to Tokyo Station Yaesu North Exit (a very auspicious suburb name).

    The best shop that I found was Rocket Amateur Radio.

    There are other places nearby, including the Tokyo Radio Department Store

    and Akihabara Radio Center.

    Here are some more random street photos.

    73 Philip VK2APL
